alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 31 at 4:31AM MST until December 31 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility below 1/4 mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Yavapai and western Coconino counties including portions of I-40 from Ash Fork to Flagstaff, I-17 near Munds Park, AZ-64 near and south of the Grand Canyon, and AZ-89 from Chino Valley to Ash Fork. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Fog, low stratus clouds, and light precipitation will cause hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
